data: The event 'Innovation Workshop' was organized to brainstorm new product features and prioritize ideas for prototype development.
The event 'Innovation Workshop' included a context setting segment, an ideation session, an idea clustering activity, and a prioritization exercise.
The event 'Innovation Workshop' involved a brief overview of current product challenges to guide the brainstorming process.
The event 'Innovation Workshop' generated over thirty ideas in breakout groups focusing on user engagement and scalability.
The event 'Innovation Workshop' organized clusters of similar ideas and conducted a voting process to identify the most promising concepts.
The event 'Innovation Workshop' concluded with the prioritization of five key features to advance to prototype development.
